Functions¶

parseJSON(render, s)

Jinja2 filter: Parses a JSON-string into a dict.
core.render.html.env.strings.parseJSON(render, s)¶

Jinja2 filter: Parses a JSON-string into a dict.

Parameters

s (str) – The string to be parsed.

Returns

The parsed dict object. Returns None if no JSON could be parsed.

Return type

dict
